addr: 2501 Grand Concourse, 3rd Floor. WORKSHOP LOCATION: 3rd Floor. Bronx, New York
title: Tuition Assistance Workshop (Bronx)-REQUIRED Information Session for 1st time Tuition Assistance Applicants
desc: Tuition Assistance College Workshop This workshop is required of all? FIRST TIME APPLICANTS ?for tuition assistance for degree programs (2 year/4 year college/Masters/Doctoral Level). ? Remember:   You MUST have made  1 FULL YEAR of employment, by the 1st day of the semester that you want to start  AND? be  Wage Class 1 or 2,  in order to receive Tuition Assistance.  ? Wage Class 3 or Per Diem employees are not eligible. ? Please arrive 15 minutes early, and bring a pen. Latecomers will not be allowed to enter, and will have to reschedule. Please plan ahead for travel delays.
